basicInfo.name: Fai
basicInfo.flavor: When Fai was surrounded by the beastkin army in the desert, she used the Power of Flames to light her enemies ablaze. People who saw the desert burning began calling the area the Blazing Desert.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 3 Enemies
 - 35% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 130% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Spear of Agnia
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Each attack has a 60% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 57% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 29% Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Increases Chance: Burn chance becomes 70%.

Skill 2.name: Flame Dragon's Greetings
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - 100% chance to inflict 3 Buff Removal(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 125% of Physical Attack plus 14% of the target's Max HP 1 time(s). (HP-based damage limited to 150% of caster's Attack)
 - Instant Execution of an enemy with 24% or lower HP.
 - Enemies in Row w/ Main Target
 - 60% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 410% of Physical Attack plus 26% of the target's Max HP.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Increases Effect: Execution condition becomes 30% of HP.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: Execution targets enemies that share a row with the target.

Passive.name: Surging Flames
Passive.desc:
All Enemies
 - Inflicts Physical Vulnerability. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Revives with 80% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 135% of Physical Attack upon revival. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
 - Deals additional damage equal to 70% of Physical Attack against targets inflicted with [Burn].
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Physical Vulnerability to 20%.
 - Increases Effect: HP gained upon revival becomes 100%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Comrades on the battlefield, Rachel, honor, authority, strength, a peaceful world, grilled fish
profile.dislikes: Orcs, beastkin, Balack, cowardly people, weakness
profile.story: When Fai was surrounded by the beastkin army in the desert, she used the Power of Flames to light her enemies ablaze. People who saw the desert burning began calling the area the Blazing Desert.

basicInfo.name: Fai
basicInfo.flavor: Fai brings new victories to the human kingdom that had lost battle after battle to the beastkin armies. She carries a red flag and leads soldiers on the frontlines in every battle.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 3 Enemies
 - 30% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Spear of Agnia
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Each attack has a 55% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 52% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 52% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Flame Dragon's Greetings
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - 100% chance to inflict 2 Buff Removal(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 115% of Physical Attack plus 11% of the target's Max HP 1 time(s). (HP-based damage limited to 150% of caster's Attack)
 - Instant Execution of an enemy with 18% or lower HP.
 - Enemies in Row w/ Main Target
 - 60% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 305% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Surging Flames
Passive.desc:
All Enemies
 - Inflicts Physical Vulnerability. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Revives with 60% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 125% of Physical Attack upon revival. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
 - Deals additional damage equal to 70% of Physical Attack against targets inflicted with [Burn].
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Physical Vulnerability to 13%.

profile.story: Fai brings new victories to the human kingdom that had lost battle after battle to the beastkin armies. She carries a red flag and leads soldiers on the frontlines in every battle.

basicInfo.name: Fai
basicInfo.flavor: Long ago, a prolonged war between ancient humans and beastkin raged over the southern territory. Fai, hailing from a prestigious family of knights and excelling with spears, grew up to become a renowned knight of the kingdom.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 3 Enemies
 - 25% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Spear of Agnia
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Each attack has a 50% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 47% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 47% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Flame Dragon's Greetings
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 Buff Removal(s).
 - 85% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 105% of Physical Attack plus 9% of the target's Max HP 1 time(s). (HP-based damage limited to 150% of caster's Attack)
 - Instant Execution of an enemy with 12% or lower HP.
 - Enemies in Row w/ Main Target
 - 55% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 275% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Surging Flames
Passive.desc:
All Enemies
 - Inflicts Physical Vulnerability. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Revives with 40% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 110% of Physical Attack upon revival. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
 - Deals additional damage equal to 70% of Physical Attack against targets inflicted with [Burn].
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Physical Vulnerability to 10%.
